item.description:
Update -

We have 2 tee times one for 10:40 and one for 10:48 - I reserved all with carts and the fee is $56 + $16 for carts. We can decide when we get there if we want to walk or ride.

See you then!





Hi all,

Since the first meetup filled up so quickly, I thought I would add another. Anyone up for a round at Brookmeadow in Canton???
I will call tomorrow to get tee times- hopefully in the morning.
Let me know
Thank you
Amy

BTW - this will be my first outing of the year so it should be good for a few laughs:)

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Brookmeadow Golf Club
